org.omnaest.utils.table
Interface Row<E>

Type Parameters:
E -
All Superinterfaces:
ImmutableRow<E>, ImmutableStripe<E>, Iterable<E>, Serializable, Stripe<E>
public interface Row<E>
extends Stripe<E>, ImmutableRow<E>

A Row represents the horizontal Stripe of elements of a Table

By default a Row will reflect any changes to its underlying Table. Even the removing of Rows is captured by ImmutableStripe.isDeleted() or normal modifications by ImmutableStripe.isModified().
If a Row ImmutableStripe.isDetached() it will not reflect those changes to the underlying Table anymore, which can cause inconsistent data.

Author:
Omnaest
See Also:
ImmutableRow, Table, Column, Stripe
